fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Feed someone so much food that they die of a coma

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your attack can only be stopped if someone else attacks your target, which makes them projectile vomit all the food.
-The target gets basic defense from any other attack that night. Just not your attack
-If someone dies to you, the host must also send them the image provided below
